articles.title: EU's full ban on Russian coal to be pushed back to mid-August -sources - Reuters
articles.description: European Union envoys are set to approve on Thursday a ban on Russian coal that would take full effect from mid-August, a month later than initially planned, two EU sources told Reuters, following pressure from Germany to delay the measure.
